definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
Gwoyeu Romatzyh, a romanization system for Chinese devised by Y.R. Chao and others in 1925-26

sentences.english: They can always write their local languages in the Roman characters.
sentences.chinese: 他们大可用罗马字母来书写他们的土语。

sentences.english: Zero is the only number that cannot be represented by Roman numerals.
sentences.chinese: 零是唯一的数字，不能由罗马字目代表。

sentences.english: This review of Roman calligraphy letters shows you exactly how to create your letters.
sentences.chinese: 这种书法罗马字母的审查表明你到底如何创建你的信。

sentences.english: Romaji information file not installed, so Romaji conversion cannot be used.
sentences.chinese: 没有安装罗马字信息文件，因此无法使用罗马字转换。

sentences.english: Romaji information file not installed, so Romaji conversion cannot be used.
sentences.chinese: 没有安装罗马字信息文件，因此无法使用罗马字转换。

sentences.english: Sputnik"is an example of a Russian word which has been transliterated into Roman script. " Sputnik"
sentences.chinese: 便是用罗马字母拼写俄文单词的一个例子。

sentences.english: Sputnik"is an example of a Russian word which has been transliterated into Roman script."
sentences.chinese: 便是用罗马字母拼写俄文单词的一个例子。

definition: reading or phonetic value of a character
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
to indicate the pronunciation of Chinese characters using Pinyin or Bopomofo etc/phonetic notation/(specifically) Bopomofo (abbr. for 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4])
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
see 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4]
